name: Puppy Raiders & The Fetch Wizards
description:
Puppy Raider & The Fetch Wizards is am imagination quest inspired by collecting childhood memories in a fantasia type living home. Collecting specific items for the Fetch Wizards is key to completing this dream quest. If you succeed you will have become a great fetch-puppy. Pay attention to how much time you have to fetch!

CODE: TIMK

DESIGN:PAULB
